### A little about me...
- üè° San Antonio, TX
- üíª Full-Stack Javascript Engineer at <img src="assets/zencastr.svg" /> [Zencastr](https://zencastr.com)
- üë®üèº‚Äçüíª Co-Founder of <img src="assets/sprocket.svg" /> [Sprocket](https://github.com/SprocketBot)
- üî• Homelabber, custom keyboard builder, and amateur astrophotographer
- üìñ I'm learning Rust during Advent of Code 2022
